name: Vodka Martini

ingredients.name: of lemon peel
ingredients.original_string: 1 strip of lemon peel or 1 green olive (optional, for garnish)

instructions:
Combine 2–2½ oz. vodka and ¼–½ oz. dry vermouth in a mixing glass or cocktail shaker; fill with ice and stir until well chilled, about 15 seconds. Strain into a well-chilled martini glass, coupe glass, or other cocktail glass. Twist 1 strip of lemon peel (if using) over drink to express its oils, then drop peel into glass, or drop 1 green olive (if using) into glass.
